lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic says the Miami Open will remain in Key Biscayne for a long time, and South Florida tennis fans hope he's right.
snippet: Novak Djokovic says the Miami Open will remain in Key Biscayne for a long time, and South Florida tennis fans hope he's right....

headline.main: Champion Djokovic Says Miami Open Will Stay in Key Biscayne
headline.print_headline: Champion Djokovic Says Miami Open Will Stay in Key Biscayne
